org.jplot2d.transform

Class NormalTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.transform.NormalTransform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearNormalTransform, LogarithmicNormalTransform

    public abstract class NormalTransform
extends java.lang.Object
    Immutable! Transform between value range and normalized range [0, 1].
